subject: Re: Dear:Beneficiary
body:
Attention : Nancy

This is a compensation fund form International Monetary Fundâ€™s (IMF) to compensate all scam victims which your email address was among the list of contacts that will be compensated,

Issue of being diverted:  officials that was appointed to credit all victims tried diverting the money to their families but we were informed by some of the good officials in our department then we have no other option than to process the transaction ourselves they have been apprehended

The Gazette cannot be released to anyone all we need from you is to follow the instructions accordingly and you will receive your fund successfully

Fill this information below

1) Your full name and Address,
2) Phone, fax or mobile.

After filling the information above you have to choose if you want to receive your fund via ATM MasterCard or via online banking transfer service, we await your urgent response

Yours Sincerely,

Mr.Andrew Willson
Director, Foreign Matters
